entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is mentioned as someone who escaped from Dementors. He is described as a wizard who was able to fight against the Dementors.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who made a dementor on the train go away using certain defenses.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as someone who knows about certain defenses against Dementors and is able to catch his briefcase when it slips from the desk.

relationships.description: Sirius Black escaped from Dementors, as mentioned by Harry and Lupin.
Harry made a dementor on the train go away using certain defenses.
Lupin caught his briefcase when it slipped from the desk.
Dementors are supposed to drain a wizard of his powers if he is left with them too long.
Lupin knows about certain defenses against Dementors.
